overview: I am the founder of Wikitube.TV “What do you want to watch?” We are a FOUNDUPS CORP., foundupÂ®. Foundups are strategic initiatives of FOUNDUPS CORP., and its affiliates. Wikitube.TV was launched in early 2010 and was put on hold after YouTube validated it by rolling out a lot of similar features on YouTube (playlists, auto play and continual streaming features). The validation made me realize that the current “just build it!” positioning that lean startup is position is nothing more than a way for companies with funding to use as proof of concepts to developing new products such as youtube’s “Leanback” or oddly enough our three months before leanback was rolled out, users called wikitube.tv the “YouTube for couch potatoes”
